a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Human Development Index: males vs. females, 2022
The Human Development Index (HDI) is a summary measure of key dimensions of human development: a long
and healthy life, a good education, and a decent standard of living.
Data source: UNDP, Human Development Report (2024)
